sentences.en: Abortion is an issue which produces little reasoned argument.
sentences.cn: 对堕胎这个问题很少有理智的看法。

sentences.en: But he then went on to refer very directly to the argument.
sentences.cn: 不过接下来他就直切主题提到了那场争论。

sentences.en: He could hear Hilton's strident voice rising in vehement argument with Houston.
sentences.cn: 他能听到希尔顿在同休斯敦激烈争吵时的咆哮声。

sentences.en: He may have a hard job selling that argument to investors.
sentences.cn: 他可能得磨破嘴皮才能让投资者接受那个观点。

sentences.en: He was disappointed and saddened that legal argument had stopped the trial.
sentences.cn: 法律论证迫使审理中止，这让他既失望又悲伤。

sentences.en: He was in an argument with his landlord downstairs.
sentences.cn: 他与楼下的房东发生了争执。

sentences.en: I'vemade this argument, and not a few people would disagree with me.
sentences.cn: 我提出了此论点，而这会是相当多的人都不同意的。

sentences.en: It was in the nature of a debate rather than an argument.
sentences.cn: 那更像是一场辩论，而不是争吵。

sentences.en: Let me now pull together the threads of my argument.
sentences.cn: 现在让我来将我的论点串起来。

sentences.en: Perhaps your force of argument might have made some difference.
sentences.cn: 或许是你的雄辩使情况发生了变化。

sentences.en: She had a big argument with her husband.
The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentences.cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentences.en: There's a strong argument for lowering the price.
sentences.cn: 有一个支持降低价格的有力论据。

sentences.en: This argument is untenable from an intellectual, moral and practical standpoint.
sentences.cn: 从智识、道德和现实的角度来看，这一论点是站不住脚的。

sentences.en: This will be used to counterweight the capital gains argument.
sentences.cn: 这将被用来反对资本收益论。

sentences.en: Today, most people think that argument no longer holds.
sentences.cn: 今天，大多数人认为那个论点已经站不住脚了。

sentences.en: We need to provide a convincing argument as to why the system should be changed.
sentences.cn: 我们得提出有说服力的论据，证明为何要改变体制。

sentences.cn: 为什么卡梅拉把他扯进这场争论中？
